body:
This PR adds the following new packages:
- Abinit: Fortran code for DFT calculations. Supports MPI and OpenMP.
  Uses blas/lapack, fftw3 and `libxc@2.2.1`. Add variants for `openmp`, `scalapack` and `hdf5` 
- Atompaw package: Fortran code for generating PAW pseudopotentials 
  Depends on`libxc@2.2.1`
- EtsfIO: Fortran library implementing the ETSF file format specifications.
  Depends on `netcdf-fortran`

Added  libxc version 2.2.1 (required by Abinit and atompaw)
title: Abinit: Added package(s)
